title: Create cake shop website showcasing 6 uploaded product images

requirements.text: Create a responsive cake shop website homepage that showcases six products using the user-uploaded images: "Sponge Cake.jpeg", "Banana Cake.jpeg", "Nuts cookies.jpeg", "Malai Cake.jpeg", "Kitkat chocolate cake.jpeg", and "honey cake.jpeg".

quotes:
Hi Team, I need to create one cake shop website with the below images
1. Sponge Cake 
2. Banana Cake 
3. Nuts cookies
4. Malai Cake 
5. Kitkat chocolate cake
6. Honey Cake

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage renders a product grid/list with exactly 6 products matching the names provided by the user.
Each product card displays the corresponding uploaded image and product name.
Layout is responsive (mobile, tablet, desktop) with no horizontal scrolling at common breakpoints.

requirements.text: Add a product details experience for each of the six items (either a dedicated product page or an in-page modal/drawer) that opens when a user selects a product and shows at minimum: product name, larger image, and a short description (generic text is OK).

quotes: I need to create one cake shop website with the below images

acceptanceCriteria: Selecting a product from the main list opens a details view for that specific product.
Details view includes the correct product name and the same image shown on the card, displayed larger.
User can close the details view and return to the product list.

requirements.text: Add basic site sections suitable for a small cake shop website: a header with site name, navigation links (e.g., Home/Products/Contact), and a contact section with placeholder shop details (address/phone/email text placeholders only).

quotes: I need to create one cake shop website

acceptanceCriteria: Header is visible and contains a site name plus navigation links that scroll to sections or navigate within the app.
A Contact section is present and includes placeholder address, phone, and email text.
Navigation works on both desktop and mobile (e.g., collapses into a menu or stacks appropriately).

requirements.text: Apply a coherent bakery-themed visual design across the site (warm, appetizing palette such as cream/caramel/chocolate tones; friendly typography; soft card surfaces; subtle shadows). Avoid blue/purple as the primary theme colors.
acceptanceCriteria: Site uses a consistent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing) across header, product cards, details view, and contact section.
Primary visual styling reads as a bakery/cake shop theme (warm neutrals; not a tech/enterprise look).
No blue/purple is used as the dominant brand color (accents are acceptable, but theme should not be blue/purple-led).

constraints: Frontend must not modify any files under immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui (compose these components instead).
Backend must follow the single-actor Motoko architecture if any backend work is added later.
nonGoals: No third-party authentication providers (Internet Identity only, and not required for this site).
No external databases or external hosting/provider integrations.
